name: Dig'N'Shoot - Team 9
description:
Welcome to the Dig'N'Shoot game !

It is 2173 and the Earth as you know it no longer exists ... It has been ravaged by a succession of natural disasters, wiping out part of the population and making the Earth very hostile to others. You are two US Army soldiers on a surveillance patrol of a former military base, that has been buried under sand and where monsters have been spotted. During your rounds, an unfortunate event occurred: you fell into a cavity. Because of this fall, you find yourself separated from each other and thus must survive as long as possible ... Will you be able to meet the challenge ?

Theme : "There are two kinds of people : Those with loaded guns and those who dig. You dig."

Plateforme : PC - local

Type : Coop - Arcade - Survival

Art : Pixel art - Topdown 2D

Gameplay

In Dig'N'Shoot, players take on the roles of a digger and a shooter. 

The digger, located in the arena, must explore the area by digging himself a path to find bullets while avoiding the lurking monsters. 

The shooter, located outside the arena, must protect his teammate by killing the monsters that are chasing him using located turrets. 

But each player has their own stock of bullets : the digger collects them in the arena while the shooter consumes them by taking down the monsters. So, to avoid running out of ammo, players can switch roles in two different ways : either by picking up the appropriate bonus in the arena or by shooting on their teammate. 

Therefore, it is up to you to properly manage your ammunition and switch roles at the right time because the game ends when the digger is eaten by a monster.

                 Bonus (only collectable to the digger)

Bullets : Increase the bullets in your own inventory

Switch : Players change their role.

Speed up : The digger runs faster

Double ammo : The bullets collected are doubled

Dig up : Digger digs faster

Big bullets: The size of the bullets fired is increased

Controls : PS4 or Xbox controller
